summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons inmate quarters assignment history log, detailing cell/bed assignments and transfers for an inmate over time. It shows a pattern of frequent movement between different housing units, ranges, and beds within a correctional facility.

events.title: Inmate Housing Assignment
events.description: Inmate assigned to R01-001L house, R range, bed 001L.

events.title: Multiple Housing Transfers
events.description: Inmate transferred between three different beds (G02-404L, G06-405L, G06-402L) within the G range on the same day.

events.title: Series of Administrative Detention/Admissions
events.description: Inmate moved through multiple beds in Z range with 'AD' (likely Administrative Detention or Admission) designations.

events.title: Multiple Transfers in One Day
events.description: Inmate transferred between four different housing assignments (R01-001I, Z03-142I AD, Z04-214L AD, Q03-114L) within hours.

events.title: Current Housing Assignment
events.description: Document shows inmate's current assignment as of the report date: M02-029L house, M range, bed 029L.

keyFacts: This is an inmate housing history log showing frequent cell/bed transfers for an inmate from 2019 to 2021.
The inmate was housed in multiple facilities or units indicated by codes: NYM, BRO, OKL, THA, TVA.
The log shows numerous 'AD' (likely Administrative Detention/Admission) and 'DS' designations, indicating special housing statuses.
The inmate had over 30 different bed assignments in a roughly two-year period, indicating frequent movement.
The document ends with the inmate's current assignment as of July 21, 2021, in M02-029L.
